programme.title: One Small Step
programme.desc: Oftentimes climate change and pollution can seem like unfathomably difficult problems to solve. Out host’s goal is to calm those fears by inviting the audience along with her as she strives to learn how to take action against the problems plaguing our planet. In One Small Step we explore how recycling works, where our waste goes, and how we can fix the planet through our actions as individuals. Hosted by Lucy Biggers, a growing influencer in the sustainability space.

programme.desc: ''The Falcon Manifesto'' - An investigative reporter is working on a story which details the sale of U.S. military technology by businessman Edward Falcon. The story is so incriminating that her life is put at risk. Can the Baywatch team help her get out alive?

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''War of Nerves'' - Drug lord Mason Sato is released from prison and determined to seek revenge Mitch Buchannon, who helped send him away. When Sato kidnaps Hobie and Kaye, Mitch and Sato end up in a samurai-style fight to the death.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Big Monday'' - Reports of a coming storm and enormous waves bring painful memories for Mitch. Meanwhile, Kaye tries to persuade the parents of a deaf girl to send her to sign-language school.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Sea of Flames'' - A drugged-out drifter torches Eddie's lifeguard tower which leads the team to discover an illegal, lab distributing a new drug. Mitch and Thorpe try to convince the city board to buy wave runners in order to optimize their ability to save lives.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''The Chamber'' - Mitch has an out-of-body experience when his attempt to save a trapped diver without scuba gear leaves him with the bends, dangerously close to death and in desperate need of a decompression chamber.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Strangers Among Us'' - Mitch and Stephanie cope with an odd assembly of UFO enthusiasts camping on the beach in anticipation of an extraterrestrial visitation. Smugglers threaten Summer to recover diamonds they hid inside a surfboard Slade gave her.

programme.title: Baywatch

programme.title: Baywatch

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''The Tower'' - An escaped psychopath takes Summer and Stephanie hostage in a lifeguard tower, necessitating a thrilling subterranean rescue attempt by Mitch and Matt.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Coronado Del Soul, Part 1'' - The Baywatch lifeguards travel to San Diego for a week where Summer is haunted by the hotel's legendary ghost. CJ grows attached to an orphaned dolphin at Sea World. And Mitch is stranded at sea with his brother when their sailboat capsizes.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Coronado Del Soul, Part 2'' - Adrift in the ocean with his semi-conscious brother, Mitch struggles to keep himself and Buzzy alive through the long, cold night. CJ unites an orphaned dolphin with its injured mother, and Summer becomes obsessed with a passionate ghost.

programme.title: Birth Of Planet Earth
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tracks the perilous path our planet took in its early years through advanced, data-driven, cinema-quality CGI. It asks: How did Earth become a living planet?

programme.title: Seeing The Beginning Of Time
programme.desc: Astronomers have begun one of the most far-reaching efforts to study the cosmos. They are forging giant new telescopes, while marshaling vast computational power. These technologies are part of a historic quest: to peer into space and time, to find out how the universe gave birth to galaxies and planets, to discern the amazing world of gravity and test theories by Einstein and other scientists.

programme.title: The World's Most Powerful Telescopes
programme.desc: Discover the technology behind the world’s most powerful telescopes. Featuring interviews with leading scientists at the European Southern Observatory, and 4K HDR space photography, uncover how instruments four billion times more sensitive than the human eye are revolutionizing our understanding of the cosmos.

programme.title: Earth in 1000 Years
programme.desc: There are signs that Earth's great stores of ice on Greenland and Antarctica are beginning to melt in the wake of rising sea surface temperatures. With sea levels beginning to rise, scientists are looking back at past geological ages to understand the influence of ocean currents and other factors. They are searching for insights into where our planet may be headed 1000 into the future and beyond.

programme.title: Dive To Tiger Central
programme.desc: When tiger sharks gather in great numbers off the coast of South Africa in the summer, it's time to get out of the water, but for shark expert Mark Addison, it's a chance to continue his life’s work. Free diving without chain mail or a cage, Mark puts his life on the line in an effort to reveal the true nature of these sharks, debunking the myth that they are nothing more than notorious killers.

programme.title: Fish Addictions S6:E5 "Our Best Jumbo Perch Bite Yet??" pt2
programme.desc: As we told you guys last week, this trip to South Dakota was second to none. If the bucket of Jumbo Perch doesn't tell you that, I don't know what will!

programme.title: Fish Addictions S6:E6 "Crushing Jumbo Perch" Ice Fishing on Unfamiliar Lakes
programme.desc: Welcome to Part 1 of a 2 part Jumbo Perch search. Mike and the guys are excited for some ice fishing on unfamiliar lakes with their sights on crushing jumbo perch. Fish Addictions Staff members Taylor and Anthony put in a TON of research to find the lakes with not only the best current up to date netting/stocking reports but also the best potential for some quality jumbos.

programme.title: Fish Addictions S6:E7 "Crushing Jumbo Perch" Ice Fishing on Unfamiliar Lakes pt 2
programme.desc: Part 2 picks up right where Part 1 left off. The guys have a few lakes ahead, plus an insane night bite surprise!

programme.title: TRP S4:E4 Crushing Your Resolutions With Meal Prep
programme.desc: Over the past two weeks we’ve talked about new year’s resolutions and strategies to have the most success at them. A big part of a lot of people’s resolutions is diet. Now I’m not going to tell you what you should and should not eat, but I do have some strategies for sticking to your plan once you have worked out your diet schedule with a doctor or dietician. In this episode, we go over strategies for making sure you are comsuming the right amount of food, and how to meal prep to ensure that you will be able to stick to this plan for the long term.

programme.title: TRP S4:E7 Eating Healthy On The Boat
programme.desc: When I am fishing and shooting Saltwater Experience, one of the hardest things to do is eat consistently healthy. When you’re headed out on the water, it’s way too easy to just grab an unhealthy snack or something that you know will fill you up, but isn’t the best for you. In this episode I break down some tricks that I have found to help me stay consistent with my diet, even out on the water. I go over some key foods that I bring on the boat that are available in most grocery stores without being unhealthy. We also go over things to avoid. I hope that this helps you to make the most of your day on the water, without ruining your diet. By the way…How are your 2021 diet resolutions coming along? Text “Accountability” to (305) 930-7346 to join our community of people holding each other accountable to our goals in 2021.

programme.title: TRP S4:E8 How To Start Your Own Podcast
programme.desc: I have had many people reach out to me asking how to start a podcast themself, so this week I had Dave Stewart of Wet Fly Swing on the podcast to explain just that. Dave is a podcasting expert with a lot of experience teaching podcasting. He also has 3 podcasts of his own. If starting a podcast has ever crossed your mind, be sure to tune into this episode. To get on Dave’s e-mail list of how to start a podcast in 30 days, go to outdoorsonline.co/startapodcast

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 20
programme.desc: World Poker Tour ignited the global poker boom with a unique television show based on a series of high-stakes tournaments. WPT events turned Gus Hansen into the Great Dane and Daniel Negreanu into Kid Poker, and created dozens of poker-made millionaires.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 21
programme.desc: The battle rages on between the two professionals and the two amateurs causing a complete reversal in the players starting chip stacks. The historically supportive Bay 101 crowd has helped to throw the two local heroes into the chip leading positions and leave much to be desired for the pros, but will their momentum allow one to break through and claim the WPT title? Kimberly Lansing Anchors while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call the play.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 22
programme.desc: WPT’s very own Mike Sexton is sat amongst the finalists this year in Venice to widespread fan and viewer appreciation giving him an awesome opportunity to top off his poker resume with a WPT title. Mike is joined by his Italian counterpart, Erion Islamay, as well as three notable international pros and the chip leading amateur Marcello Montagner. In place of Mike, ‘Poker Brat’ and poker legend, Phil Hellmuth, joins Vince Van Patten in the commentator’s booth for the Grand Prix de Paris

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 23
programme.desc: World Poker Tour ignited the global poker boom with a unique television show based on a series of high-stakes tournaments. WPT events turned Gus Hansen into the Great Dane and Daniel Negreanu into Kid Poker, and created dozens of poker-made millionaires.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 24
programme.desc: A new WPT champion will be crowned at the world’s oldest casino in the final episode of the WPT Venice Grand Prix. Poker Hall of Famer Mike Sexton has managed to reach the final three but he sitting in the 3rd chip position behind two Italians who each look as eager as him to take down the title tonight. One of the most successful poker pros of all time, Phil Helmuth, fills in for Mike in the commentator’s booth alongside resident expert Vince Van Patten for the finale of the Venice Grand Prix.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 25
programme.desc: WPT and the Royal Flush Girls hit the Florida coast for fun in the sun and high stakes poker. Young professionals and budding roommates, Kevin Eyster and Zo Karim, are sat across from each other at the final table but their usual talk of strategy will be hushed tonight as each eye up the WPT Champions Cup for themselves. Amanda Leatherman stands in for Kimberly Lansing as anchor while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call the play by play at the Seminole Hard Rock Showdown.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 26
programme.desc: Six remain in contention in the Sunshine State of Florida for a chance to win over $600,000. The recent WPT trend of young guns dominating the final table has not changed as four of the six finalists are twenty-seven years young or younger. These modern pros feel confident to play any hand with anyone making this a super aggressive final table. Amanda Leatherman anchors while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten commentate from the booth at the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 27
programme.desc: The two roommates, Kevin Eyster and Zo Karim, have survived to our final hour of coverage at the Seminole Hard Rock Hotel & Casino along with persistent amateur, Ben Tarzia. Zo has risen from measly short stack to worthy contender, though he hasn’t been able to displace his buddy from the chip-lead as of yet. Amanda Leatherman anchors while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten bring us the thrilling conclusion to the Seminole Hard Rock Poker Showdown.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 28
programme.desc: The stakes have never been higher as the top poker pros and a mix of businessmen put up a staggering $100,000 to play in the largest buy-in event on the World Poker Tour. This stop is extra special for the WPT as not all of our finalists will cash! In fact, only the top three will go home with anything making this the largest money bubble in WPT history. Kimberly Lansing hosts the extraordinary event while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call the super high roller action at Bellagio.

programme.title: Nick Cobb - Broke-ish
programme.desc: Hailing from Memphis, TN, Nick Cobb attended Indiana University where he majored in Psychology and learned to obsess over meaningless nonsense. This led him to work in his first comedy club, aptly named “The Looney Bin.” It was at a tiny Beale Street bar where Nick won a stand-up competition, was bitten by the comedy bug and moved to New York to pursue The Dream. While in New York, Nick was seen on Comedy Central’s Live at Gotham, VH1’s Morning Buzz, AMC’s Date Night as well as on NBC’s “Last Comic Standing” where he not only earned a spot in the semi-finals, but was also featured in a montage of comics recognized for having highly original material. Less than a year ago, Nick took his talents to Los Angeles. Since moving out West he won the March Madness Competition at the Hollywood Improv, appeared on Comedy Central’s Inside Amy Schumer, and had his late night debut on The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson. He also recently performed on AXS’s Gotham Comedy Live. He also played the lead in the espn.com comedic web series “Team Players,” and has been seen in many commercials including Pepsi Max, Asthma.com, Joe’s Crab Shack, Carmax and starred in an e-Trade spot during halftime of the Super Bowl! When not performing standup, Nick is brooding over that one guy in the crowd who was texting during his act.

programme.title: Paul Sheffield - Singled Out
programme.desc: Paul has been doing comedy since 2008 and has been headlining in Utah, Idaho, and Wyoming. He has a CD on iTunes Sheffield Had it Worse" Winner of 2010 Happy Valley Comedy Competition.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Scott Novotny - A Trip to Goofyville
programme.desc: Scott Novotny brings his high-energy goofyness to the live audience at VidAngel Studios.

programme.title: Steve Soelberg - WE SAY BIM
programme.desc: Extremely funny comedian and overall nice person Steve Soelberg brings an observational, story telling style of comedy which has repeatedly left his regularly sold out audiences in stitches. Whether he's relating the experiences of growing up in a large family in Seattle, Washington or recounting the time he saw an angry guy in a tutu at a Ragnar relay, he has a way of making each audience member feel as if they were just the person he wanted to tell the story to because he knew they'd enjoy it just as much as he did. Due to his growing popularity as a comedian, he has appeared multiple times on local TV affiliates (Fox, KUTV, and KSL), on the radio, and has entertained tens of thousands traveling the country not only as comedian, but also as the voice of the Ragnar relay races as their race announcer and emcee. Steve's positive, upbeat personality paired with his observational, often self deprecating humor and his ability to appeal to a broad audience guarantee his shows will be a hilarious and memorable experience for all those who attend.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Costaki Economopoulos - Now That I'm A Grown-up
programme.desc: For 20 years Costaki has been living his dream as a full-time stand up comic. He has written jokes for Bette Midler, Jay Leno, MTV, and BET. You may have seen him on Showtime or heard him on Sirius, but you probably know him best from his regular appearances on the nationally syndicated Bob & Tom Radio Show.

programme.title: Rik Roberts - Put Down the Sweet Tea
programme.desc: Rik Roberts brings a little bit of Nashville everywhere he goes. From quick bits about family and technology, to surprising stories about marriage and music – you’ll find something you can relate to. Growing up in Kentucky, he got his hands dirty working

programme.title: Jeff Allen - I Can Laugh About it Now
programme.desc: Jeff Allen combines clean, hilarious humor like no other comedian working today. Besides performing at corporate functions and fundraisers, he regularly appears on television, radio, and casinos across the country. Consistently making heroes out of meeting planners, Jeff Allen provides world-class comedy.

programme.title: David Crowe - White Bread
programme.desc: David Crowe is a 20 year veteran of the comedy stage. After winning both the Seattle and San Francisco Comedy Competitions, then performing for a US President the same year, his career took off and has never stopped. On stage Crowe is armed with a "gallery of facial expressions", a host of accents and a "nerdy charisma that is utterly captivating." He has been featured on Showtime with his own One Hour Comedy Special "Crooked Finger," along with numerous appearances on Comedy Central, Bob&Tom Radio, SiriusXM and Pandora. Overseas, he crushed the competition at the Edinburgh International Fringe Festival garnering three perfect 5-Star reviews from their rather sticky and jaded press (you can read them here in the Testimonials section). David is a guaranteed hit on the corporate entertainment circuit. He has performed at literally hundreds of corporate and private events across the United States and Canada. (See "Past Client" list under Testimonials). He recently concluded a nationwide comedy tour for Investors Group, a financial services company, where he performed for over 60,000 of their most valued clients in 60 different cities. To date, David has released five comedy albums. He believes the best way to stay sharp and relevant is to continue to hone and perfect new material at comedy clubs across the country with the goal of releasing an new comedy special every few years.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Paul Morrissey - A Real Humdinger
programme.desc: Paul was raised as a sports fanatic in the tiny town of Owego, in upstate New York. After four years of playing college basketball, somehow he graduated. Aside from playing in the NBA, his dream job was to talk about sports for a living. Paul then moved to California after landing a television sports anchor job but found out quickly that he was “too much of a smart-ass” for TV news. After he was fired, Paul took his unique sense of humor to comedy club stages all over the country. In 2005, Paul was selected to perform at the HBO Comedy Festival in Las Vegas. Morrissey has also been a finalist in several national comedy competitions including Wendy’s Comedy Challenge, Comedy Central’s Open Mic Fight and Maxim’s Real Men of Comedy.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Jordan Makin - The BFFG
programme.desc: Born and raised in the heart of Utah County, Jordan Makin had to compensate for his red hair and uneventful childhood by learning to be funny. His unique observations will make you laugh and his stories about feeling awkward will help you appreciate your life more. He has worked with many comedy greats, such as Marc Maron, Ryan Hamilton, and Drew Lynch. His comedy has been featured at the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival and the Idaho Laugh Fest. Jordan is the co-creator and co-host of The Happy Valley Podcast.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:DC Benny - You Don't Look Funny
programme.desc: Benny lives in Brooklyn where he fiddles around with old Land Rovers when he is supposed to be helping his wife run her natural skincare business. He has a dog named Grits and two cats who prefer that he not share their personal information in this bio.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Danny Villalpando - Too Informative
programme.desc: Danny has been performing stand up comedy for over sixteen years. He’s had the opportunity to work for many corporate events, charity organizations, and cruise ships. He has also had the privilege of working worldwide with the USO and Comic’s on Duty. His comedy has taken him such places as Japan, Singapore, Afghanistan, Panama, Honduras, Greenland, Iraq, Italy, and Greece.... just to name a few! In addition to headlining comedy clubs across the United States, Danny has also performed on television seventeen times. He’s been seen on NBC’s “Friday Night” as well as “The Latino Laugh Festival” and Comedy Central. Danny’s acting talents were also displayed as a bartender, on NBC’s “Meet My Folk’s.” Most recently he completed an independent film with Second City called "Time Share." Most of Danny’s comedy is based on his life experiences. Comedy fans described his act as the type of act you could do anywhere. From a bar, to corporate, it’s just funny!

programme.title: Sinister Squad
programme.desc: When a violent supernatural cult known as Death's Messengers reigns terror on Earth, a team of malevolent storybook villains is coerced into fighting in the modern world, but these baddies must learn to keep their true wickedness at bay if they want any chance at freedom.

programme.title: Titanic II
programme.desc: On the 100th anniversary of the original voyage, a modern luxury liner christened "Titanic II," follows the path of its namesake. But when a tsunami hurls an ice berg into the new ship's path, the passengers and crew must fight to avoid a similar fate.

programme.title: Trolland
programme.desc: Fenn the Troll hates the Troll pastime of pranking, and is teased so much for it that he runs away. But when a long-suffering park ranger starts capturing the other Trolls, it's up to Fenn to rescue his family and friends - without pranking.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Astronomer George Herbert (C. Thomas Howell) is assigned to investigate reports of strange meteors crashing into earth near New York, Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.

programme.title: Android Cop
programme.desc: In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness - with the help of the machine's powerful technology and weaponry.

programme.title: Battle of Los Angeles
programme.desc: In February 1942 US forces engaged an unidentified flying object above Los Angeles. Now almost 70 years later, the alien invaders have returned.

programme.title: Automata | Full Series
programme.desc: In an alternate 1930's New York City, private eye Sam Regal and his incredibly smart automaton partner, Carl Swangee investigate a murder. Directed by Van Alan

programme.title: Automata | Full Series
programme.desc: In an alternate 1930's New York City, private eye Sam Regal and his incredibly smart automaton partner, Carl Swangee investigate a murder. Directed by Van Alan

programme.title: Into the Great Beyond... Beyond | Episode 1
programme.desc: Young Stewart Lipinski is made captain of an exploratory space mission into space...his older sister Karen is made his second in command, and is none too happy about it. When their ship and crew stumble into a different universe with no way home, Stewart and Karen have to figure out their differences in order to survive.

programme.title: Getting to Know You | Episode 2
programme.desc: In an attempt to raise the morale of his frightened and fudge-riddled crew, Stewart initiates a bonding session that devolves into ice-breaker games. When Karen discovers that one of the crew members is actually an alien who's implanted memories in their heads, they play a high-stakes game of Mafia to weed out the intruder.

programme.title: The Death of A.R.T. | Episode 3
programme.desc: The crew prepares a video to broadcast to anyone that might be listening in space. ART gets knocked off the ship and then saves the crew when a planet starts to form around the ship.

programme.title: Ted Talks | Episode 4
programme.desc: Tina finds a way to get dumped by her Earthbound boyfriend despite having no contact with Earth. The ship turns out to be infested with spyware, but not the way you would think.

programme.title: Trouble's Brewing | Episode 5
programme.desc: Kent, Art and Natasha demand human privileges, but a coffee maker hijacks their robot revolution and takes over the ship. Meanwhile, time distortion turns Tina and Michael's half-day mission into a year-long ordeal on a barren planet.

programme.title: Powerless | Episode 6
programme.desc: With the ship trapped in a lightning storm, Karen struggles to persuade the crew to limit their power usage, while Stewart learns to pilot the ship manually with help from Zalian. Meanwhile, Kent attempts to re-educate Natasha, who has been reduced to the mental age of a child after the first lightning strike.

programme.title: First Contact | Episode 7
programme.desc: An alien appears in Stewart's dreams, but only seems to communicate if Stewart's dreams are erotic in nature. Stewart enlists both A.R.T. and Zalian's medicine cabinet in a dark, humiliating journey to make first contact. Karen slaps Michael in a rage over his tryst with Tina, and has to go undergo HR arbitration, overseen by an un-objective Tina.

programme.title: Finale | Episode 8
programme.desc: The crew makes contact with an alien at long last, but this historic moment is cut short when they realize they have a chance to make it home through an interplanetary ripple. Stewart and Michael decide to stay behind to learn more about the alien's culture, only to be underwhelmed - when they return, Karen chews them out for their mistake. Meanwhile, Tina uses Zalian, A.R.T., holograms, sedatives, and magnets to give Kent and Natasha their first and only date. Both groups are ripped from their activities by a series of shocking revelations about the universe.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: When a wounded dog tracks down the man who murdered his master, a gold mine owner, Cisco tries to get proof he is the killer.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid
programme.desc: A poor man steals Cisco's and Pancho's horses, trying to raise money to impress his visiting daughter. Later, he becomes the unsuspecting fall guy in a cattle rustling operation.
